de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.init
Class XFInit

java.lang.Object
  de.fhg.iml.vlog.xfvrp.opt.init.XFInit

public class XFInit
extends java.lang.Object

This is the standard initialization of the giant tour out of the read data. The first thing of an optimization process is the creation of such a giant tour. Hereby all orders/customers will be arranged in a way, that each order/customer is visited by its own tour. If multiple depots are available, each single route has an alternating depot. Some construction optimization methods ignore the giant tours and rebuild their own. But for reasons of convenience in all cases a giant tour is initialized by this class. If orders/customers can not be served in a valid way with the given restrictions, they are excluded in an invalid list. These orders/customers are reinserted in a later step of optimization.

Author:
hschneid

Method Detail

initGiantTour

public Node[] initGiantTour(XFVRPModel model,
                            java.util.List<Node> invalidNodes)
Builds the giant tour.
A list of nodes, where the depot is allowed to be placed multiple times. Each area surrounded by two depots is called tour. A giant tour has to start and end with a depot. Multiple depots are inserted in a alternating sequence. If nodes cannot be served within the given constraints, these nodes are excluded from optimization in the invalidNodes list.

Parameters:
model -
invalidNodes -
Returns:
